​- Combines the comfort of a wireless bra with the lifting effect of a wired bra.
- The gorgeous design lifts your mood, flatters your figure, and provides ample support.
- Features delicate flower motif lace and a flattering plunge neckline.
- ​Newly developed three-dimensional resin parts are built into the cups to provide a shaping effect without sacrificing the comfort of a wireless bra.
- The cross component stops the cups from spreading and maintains the contoured form.
- The cross component provides support and upward lift.
- No wires or resin parts at the bottom of the cup.
items.name: WOMEN Wireless Bra (Shape Lift)
items.shortDescription: A comfortable fit with a lifting effect. Creates a natural, flattering outline.

- ​Newly developed three-dimensional resin parts are built into the cups to provide a contoured outline while still being as easy to wear as a wireless bra.
- ​The cross part stops the cups from spreading and keeps the contoured form.
- Supports the bottom of the cup and provides lift to make the décolleté line look charming.

- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made with double layered wool and polyester fabric, combining lightness and warmth.
- Rounded, oversized cut.
- An easy throw-on outer layer.
- Elegant design with minimal detailing.
items.name: WOMEN Wool Blend Tailored Coat
items.shortDescription: An easy throw-on layer with a roomy, rounded cut. Designed for a minimalist style.

items.longDescription:
- From our Ines de la Fressange collaboration collection. Synonymous with the timeless appeal of French chic.
- Warm double-faced wool blend fabric has a soft, airy feel.
- Straight cut with an elegant drape.
- A double breasted, collarless coat.
- Belted waist.
items.name: WOMEN Wool Blend Coat
items.shortDescription: A soft coat with a lovely drape. Belted waist for more styling options.

items.composition: Shell: 80% Polyester, 20% Viscose/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Sleeve: 70% Polyester, 30% Viscose/ Hood: 100% Polyester/ Hood Edge: Inner Layer: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: Outer Layer: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- Fill power of 640+.
- Matte finish for a casual design great for everyday wear.
- Hybrid construction combines the benefits of down and functional padding to achieve both lightness and warmth.
- Warm down is used for the upper body, front, and, back, while the parts that move such the hood, sleeves, and waist are made with padding.
- Non-quilted design on the outside for a sleek look.
- Length covers the hips for added protection from the cold.
- Cut pairs well with voluminous tops.
- Durable water-repellent technology. ・Warm down that is also sleek and stylish.
- Sophisticated A-line silhouette.
items.name: WOMEN Hybrid Down Short Coat
items.shortDescription: High-performance down that combines warmth and ease of movement. Let’s you keep warm in style.

items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Made from extra-long pile combed cashmere.
- Double layered collar at the back.
- Ribbon detail at the side slit.
